The idea is that the body contains a hormone or substance called melatonin, which is responsible for sleep and the quality of sleep. Sometimes, due to depression, anxiety, stress, or other things, the body gets tired and the body secretes this substance in a small amount, so the person does not sleep. This product consists of melatonin and herbs that help with sleep, so you can take Take two pills to increase the secretion of the substance and give you sleep and make your sleep quality good. This is not a sedative and does not cause addiction, but take it only when necessary so that your body does not depend on it. Give it six out of ten.
